sentences.en: Are you stuck over your algebra?
sentences.cn: 你的代数题做不下去了 吧 ?

sentences.en: Four years after he graduated from school, Tom decided to dust off his algebra book.
sentences.cn: 汤姆从学校毕业四年后, 决意重温代数.

sentences.en: He finally got the answer to the algebra problem.
sentences.cn: 他终于算出了这道代数题的答案.

sentences.en: He was not good at algebra in middle school.
sentences.cn: 他中学时不擅长代数.

sentences.en: He would allow John slyly to copy his answers to impossibly difficult algebra questions.
sentences.cn: 他会让约翰偷偷抄下自己对一些极难的代数题的解答.

sentences.en: His classmates were labouring with elementary algebra.
sentences.cn: 他的同学们正在绞尽脑汁地演算初等代数题.

sentences.en: His work as a whole, however, is a monument in algebra.
sentences.cn: 不过整个说来他的工作在代数上是不朽功业.

sentences.en: Homological algebra plays such an important part in modern developments.
sentences.cn: 同调代数在现代发展中起了如此重要的作用.

sentences.en: I barely passed algebra and geometry， but here she's head of her class in both.
sentences.cn: 我的几何和代数只是勉强及格。 可是，她这两门课在班里都是第一。

sentences.en: I couldn't touch the algebra paper.
sentences.cn: 我做不出代数问题.

sentences.en: In algebra, the sign X usually denotes an unknown quantity.
sentences.cn: 在代数里, 符号X常用来表示未知数.

sentences.en: My  behavior is on  behalf of half  zebras," the  algebra teacher said.
sentences.cn: "我的行为代表了一半斑马的利益,"代数老师说.

sentences.en: My behavior is on behalf of half zebras," the algebra teacher said.
sentences.cn: "我的行为代表了一半斑马的利益,"代数老师说.

sentences.en: Newton remarked that " algebra is the analysis of the bunglers in mathematics. "
sentences.cn: 牛顿评述道: “ 代数是数学中的笨拙者的分析. ”

sentences.en: On the basis of minimax algebra theory, this paper provides an algebra method of solving countable stages decision problems in the dynamic programming.
sentences.cn: 本文根据极大极小代数理论，给出了一种用以求解动态规划中有限多阶段决策问题的代数算法。

sentences.en: She is keen on algebra.
sentences.cn: 她对代数极感兴趣.

sentences.en: The boy can't figure out the algebra problems.
sentences.cn: 这个男孩做不出这道代数题。

sentences.en: The central notion in commutative algebra is that of a prime ideal.
sentences.cn: 交换代数中最核心的概念就是素理想.

sentences.en: The ordinary numbers of arithmetic and elementary algebra are known as scalars.
sentences.cn: 算术和初等代数中普通的数通称纯量.

sentences.en: This paper uses several methods of complex functions theorey to prove fundamental theorem of algebra by argument principle, maximum modulus principle and minimum modulus principle.
sentences.cn: 从复变函数理论出发，利用辐角原理、最大模原理、最小模原理给出代数学基本定理的几种新的证明方法。

sentences.en: Through the symbol computer algebra, a fourth order perturbation solution for the one dimentional stable coupled flows of elastic fluids in the deformable porous media.
sentences.cn: 用计算机代数系统进行符号运算，求得了可变形多孔介质中弹性流体一维定常耦合渗流问题的四阶摄动解。

words.tran_cn: [数] 代数的；关于代数学的

trans.tran_en: a type of mathematics that uses letters and other signs to represent numbers and values
